ValidationRule.description: When Job Outcome = 'Euthanasia in Field', Vet and Medicine Used must be completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(animalos__Job_Outcome__c, "Euthanasia in Field"), OR( ISBLANK(Vet__c), ISBLANK(Medicine_Used__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: When Job Outcome = 'Euthanasia in Field', Vet and Medicine Used must be completed.
